Description: score on a physical performance test (higher better)
number of errors on a cognitive test (SPMSQ)
Peak expiratory flow rate, in liters/min
1 if able to walk a half mile, 0 otherwise
1 if able to climb a flight of stairs, 0 otherwise
1 if hx of atrial fibrillation. 0 otherwise
1 if history of coronary heart disease, 0 otherwise
1 if history of valvular heart disease, 0 otherwise
1 if current use of antihypertensive drugs, 0 otherwise
1 if history of diabetes mellitus, 0 otherwise
1 if history of congestive heart failure, 0 otherwise
1 if current user of digitalis, 0 otherwise
1 if current user of loop diuretics, 0 otherwise
